1.title: Meet Maria/"They" Word of the Day/Don't Use Bad Words
1.plot: Maria introduces herself, who she is, and her favorite things. Maria teaches the audience the word "They" Maria teaches the audience that it's not nice to use bad words.

2.title: Meet Peter/Twinkle Twinkle Little Star/"All" (Primer)
2.plot: The audience meets Peter. Peter tells us all about his favorite things, his family, and his dog, Sammy. He sings a song, and teaches the word "All".

3.title: Meet Chris/Walk in the Classroom/Choose Vegetables & Fruits for Each Weekday
3.plot: Chris introduces himself and tells the audience about his favorite things. He teaches us how important it is to walk, and not run in the classroom. Chris chooses fruits and veggies to match each day of the week.

4.title: Meet Marcus/Don't Push in Line/The Alphabet Song
4.plot: Marcus introduces himself, and talks about his favorite activities, his family, and more. He then teaches us not to push in line, and stay still. Marcus sings The Alphabet Song.

5.title: Meet Dee/Hello My Friend/Tell the Teacher When You're Sick
5.plot: Dee introduces herself and talks about her favorite colors, foods, and activities. She teaches us the importance of being friendly and saying "Hello!". She also teaches the audience that it is important to tell the teacher when you are not feeling well.

6.title: Always Wear Your Seatbelt/"After" Word of the Day/Put Your Toys Away
6.plot: Chris helps Dee understand the importance of wearing a seat belt. Maria introduces a word of the day. Peter and Maria team up to clean up their toys before lunch.

7.title: Use Words/Don't Touch/"Two" (Pre-Primer)
7.plot: Maria reminds us that an important school rule is to use our words, and not hit. Marcus teaches us that hitting is never OK, and we should tell people not to touch us if we don't want them to. Marcus teaches a new word.

8.title: How to Order a Balanced Meal/"Want" - Word of the Day/Itsy-Bitsy Spider
8.plot: Peter and Maria help each other order a balanced meal. Chris introduces a word of the day. Maria and Peter sing Itsy-Bitsy Spider.

9.title: Being Creative with Vegetables/"Is" (Pre-Primer)/Superfoods to the Rescue!: Yogurt
9.plot: Peter and Maria create fun pictures with vegetables. Peter teaches a new word. Dee explains how yogurt is a super food, and a tasty treat.

10.title: Respect Others on the Playground/"So" - Word of the Day/Wheels on the Bus
10.plot: Peter tells Maria how respecting others on the playground is important for everyone to have fun. Maria introduces a word of the day. Peter sings Wheels on the Bus.

11.title: Stay Seated on a Bus/"Up" (Pre-Primer)/Five Little Ducks
11.plot: Maria learns that it's not safe to get out of your seat on the bus. Marcus teaches a new word. Maria and Chris sing Five Little Ducks.

12.title: Brush Your Teeth/"Brown" - Word of the Day/Wash Your Hands
12.plot: Brush Your Teeth. "Brown" - Word of The Day. Wash Your Hands.

13.title: Guess the Snack/"I" (Pre-Primer)/What Does Sugar Do to Your Body?
13.plot: Guess the Snack. "I" (Pre-Primer). What Does Sugar Do to Your Body?

imdb.title: WonderGrove
plot: Maria, Peter, Chris, Dee, and Marcus are the kids of _WonderGrove_ (qv). They help teach each other important life lessons, like safety, fitness, nutrition, life skills and important school rules.::Monica Baker
